price: Ingatlah, sesungguhnya kepunyaan Allah apa yang ada di langit dan di bumi. Ingatlah, sesungguhnya janji Allah itu benar, tetapi kebanyakan mereka tidak mengetahui(nya).
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alā inna lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alā inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
